item.title: Kate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Kate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Kate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "She had fallen in love so many times that she began to suspect she was not falling in love at all, but doing something much more ordinary." -- Jonathan Safran Foer
